item.title: 8gb flash drive
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Use the convert X: /fs:ntfs command on windows and try to install it onto that. Yes NTFS sux, but I am not aware of any software that can change a usb to ext2 or better filesystem.

protip: running an OS on a usb stick will just wear out the flash memory and after 2-3months your flash drive will DIE.
